title: Thornbush
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA, until December 1955; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, December 1955 until April 11, 1957 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1957 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased the lithograph from the artist for $60 in December 1955. Payment of invoice (dated December 15, 1955) was acknowledged on December 20, 1955.
[2]. The lithograph is listed on a Carnegie Institute form as received "for later gift" on May 15, 1956; it was accessioned on April 11, 1957.
